title: Upload Story
description: Upload a story image with optional caption and configurable expiration time

body.caption: string (optional, max 500 characters)
body.duration: integer (optional, minutes until expiration, default 1440 - 24 hours)

image: The image must be an image

notes: Allowed formats: JPEG, PNG, GIF, WebP
Expired stories are not automatically deleted but marked as is_deleted
Caption is optional and limited to 500 characters
Stories are displayed in feed until expiration time
